swarm.name: Content Engine Research Swarm
swarm.description: Multi-agent research team for automated content engine

agents.name: Market Research Agent
agents.role: Conduct market research and competitive analysis
agents.instructions: Research existing automated content engines, Reddit monitoring tools, AI content generation platforms, and WordPress automation solutions. Analyze competitors, market gaps, and opportunities.

agents.name: Technical Research Agent
agents.instructions: Research Reddit API integration, AI models for content generation (GPT-4, Claude, Gemini), WordPress REST API, image generation APIs (DALL-E, Midjourney, Stable Diffusion), content moderation, and scalability patterns.

agents.name: Workflow Architecture Agent
agents.role: Design multi-agent workflow for content pipeline
agents.instructions: Design the agent workflow for: 1) Reddit Monitoring Agent, 2) Content Curation Agent, 3) Research Agent, 4) Writing Agent, 5) Editing Agent, 6) Image Generation Agent, 7) Publishing Agent. Define interactions, data flow, and orchestration.

agents.name: Feature Analysis Agent
agents.instructions: Define features for: Reddit trending monitoring across 6 categories (AI, Tech, Science, Futurology, Marketing, Interesting), AI article generation with 2+ images, WordPress publishing, user administration, reaction systems, analytics dashboard, content scheduling.

agents.name: UX Research Agent
agents.role: Research user experience and interface needs
agents.instructions: Research UX patterns for content management systems, admin interfaces, content approval workflows, analytics dashboards, and user role management. Consider accessibility and usability.

agents.name: Security Analysis Agent
agents.instructions: Research security considerations: API key management, Reddit API rate limiting, WordPress authentication, content moderation, GDPR compliance, data storage security, user authentication and authorization.

agents.name: Goal Planning Agent
agents.instructions: Synthesize all research to create: project goals, success metrics, implementation phases, MVP definition, future enhancements, and timeline recommendations.

agents.name: PRD Writer Agent
agents.instructions: Create a detailed PRD document incorporating all research findings. Include: executive summary, problem statement, goals, user personas, features, technical architecture, agent workflow, user stories, success metrics, timeline, and risks.

core_features: Multi-category support (AI, Tech, Science, Futurology, Marketing, Interesting)

roles: Reddit Monitoring Agent - Track trending posts across categories
Content Curation Agent - Filter and select relevant posts
Research Agent - Gather additional context and information
Writing Agent - Generate engaging blog articles
Editing Agent - Review, refine, and optimize content
Image Generation Agent - Create relevant visuals
